description: This file defines an ApiClient class that provides methods to perform authorized REST API calls (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) with support for custom headers and token management.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A wrapper class for making authorized HTTP requests with configurable base URL and token provider.

methods.name: ApiClient
methods.description: Constructor initializing the API client with base URL and token provider.

methods.name: _u
methods.description: Generates a URI with appended query parameters.

methods.name: _headers
methods.description: Constructs HTTP headers including Content-Type and optional Authorization token.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request with optional query parameters.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs an HTTP POST request with optional request body.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Performs an HTTP PUT request with optional request body.

methods.name: _check
methods.description: Checks HTTP response status and throws an exception for error status codes.
